page.title: 12PRINCES DRIVE INDUSTRIAL EST
page.content: The area of the estate is fairly big. There is a disused railway line at the back.There is a bottom level and a top level of factories.It is very clean and quiet.The buildings range from 20-2 years and there are different methods of construction. Several factories had a workforce of more than 20 but most were small units employing no more than 5 people.The buldings are arranged in an outer and an inner rectangle.It was interesting guessing the products from the factory signs.The products range from stationery to micro-meteorology. There is a dental laboratory. Most of the units were concerned with engineering. Only 1 unit of the 21 was empty. Outside Doleport Plastic Glazing Products were 4 crates going to the Falklands Islands.
